pre_caption: The video is a cityscape scenery shot. The focus is on the overall environment and atmosphere of the city rather than a specific object. The wide view captures the scale and layout of the urban area, highlighting the architecture and spatial arrangement, which emphasizes the collective scene rather than any individual element.
